sourcesContent:
//这里用一个container来装顾客的菜单列表和顾客的订单列表
//参考Dashboard.vue文件
//路由也要配置好
<template>
  <el-container>
    <el-aside width="200px">
      <el-menu>
        <el-menu-item index="/customer-dashboard/menu" @click="goMenu">菜单浏览</el-menu-item>
        <el-menu-item index="/customer-dashboard/orders" @click="goOrders">我的订单</el-menu-item>
        <el-menu-item index="/customer-dashboard/checkout" @click="goCheckout">结账</el-menu-item>
      </el-menu>
    </el-aside>
    <el-main>
      <router-view />
    </el-main>
  </el-container>
</template>
<script setup>
import { useRouter } from 'vue-router'
const router = useRouter()
const goMenu = () => router.push('/customer-dashboard/menu')
const goOrders = () => router.push('/customer-dashboard/orders')
const goCheckout = () => router.push('/customer-dashboard/checkout')
</script>
